sense.def:
Compensation
je denar, ki ga človek zahteva od posameznika ali organizacije kot nadomestilo za nekaj neprijetnega, kar se mu je zgodilo.

seg.quote: If you were killed, your dependants could get compensation.

sense.def:
A compensation
je nekaj, kar izniči nekaj slabega.

seg.quote: Look for some of the compensations your body has to make.
Letters that began to arrive from Nell were some compensation.
